    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Calculations
    class responsible for calculating total incomes, expenses and their difference
    CurrencyConverter
    a class which converts an amount between the currencies czk, euro and dollar.
    CustomScrollBar
    class for creating a custom scroll bar
    DateLabelFormatter
    a class that formats a picked date into yyyy-MM-dd format
    Main
    A Main class that is responsible for creating the GUI and running the application it uses classes such as Renderer, CustomScrollBar, DateLabelFormatter, Transaction, TransactionDB, Calculations
    Renderer
    Custom table header renderer with gradient background
    Transaction
    class which describes a Transaction and its attributes
    TransactionDB
    class that stores a list of transactions
